Properties.Name: F1Mode
Properties.Description: Enables icons of F1 Cars, and avatars of real drivers from F1

Properties.Name: UseDriverAvatars
Properties.Description:
To use custom driver pictures, enable this option, put driver images at <RLT-location>/user/images/driver_avatars/

The file name must match the driver name. Do not omit periods, spaces or other characters.

Required avatar dimensions: 430x600 px.

Properties.Name: DisplayPodiumCards
Properties.Description:
Enables cards for top 3 drivers.
Cards available at layouts:
Driver Standings
Team Standings
Season Progress (Points/Positions/Penalties)
Race Results
Qualification Results
Driver Penalty (one card)

Properties.Name: IncludeTop10AtPodiumRender
Properties.Description:
By default, the layout with the top 3 drivers does not include the remaining drivers.

Enable this option to display places 4-10.

Properties.Name: DisplayFlagsOnLeftSideOfDriverName
Properties.Description:
By default, the Driver Flag is displayed on the right.

Enable this option to place the Flag on the left side

Properties.Name: DisplayDriverNumberAtResults
Properties.Description:
By default, the driver number is not displayed in results, statistics, etc.

Enable this option to display driver numbers

Properties.Name: SplitPenaltiesAtSessionResults
Properties.Description:
By default, the time penalties displayed are the sum of the penalties assigned during and after the race.

Enable this option to divide them into columns

Properties.Name: RenderSectorsOnQualiLayout
Properties.Description:
Enable this option to display sector times on qualifying results.

Recommended to disable when results are entered manually.

Properties.Name: ShowPenaltyPointsInStandings
Properties.PublicName: Show penalty points at standings render

Properties.Name: HorizontalLineups
Properties.Description:
Enable to change the Lineups layout from vertical to horizontal.

Does not apply to the rendering of reserve drivers

Properties.Name: TeamNumberToCompare
Properties.Description:
Change this option to switch team for Team Comparison render.

Order by constructor classification.

Properties.Name: DriverNameFontSizeOnLineup
Properties.PublicName: Change font size on Lineup render
Properties.Description: Useful when there are drivers with longer names
